Class UserController

java.lang.Object
edu.secourse.patientportal.controllers.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
Controller class responsible for managing user-related operations including creating doctors, patients, and listing users.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserController(Scanner sc)
    Constructs a UserController with the specified Scanner for input.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserController

      public UserController(Scanner sc)
      Constructs a UserController with the specified Scanner for input.
      Parameters:
      sc - the Scanner object used for reading user input

  • Method Details

    • hashPassword

      public static String hashPassword(String plainPassword)
      Hashes a plain text password using the SHA-256 algorithm.
      Parameters:
      plainPassword - the plain text password to be hashed
      Returns:
      the hexadecimal string representation of the hashed password
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the SHA-256 algorithm is not available

    • createDoctor

      public void createDoctor()
      Creates a new doctor by prompting the user for required information. Collects username, email, role, name, and password, then hashes the password before storing the doctor in the system.

    • createPatient

      public void createPatient()
      Creates a new patient by prompting the user for required information. Collects username, email, role, name, and password, then hashes the password before storing the patient in the system.

    • listPatients

      public void listPatients()
      Lists all patients in the system by printing their names to the console. Only displays users who are instances of the Patient class.

    • listDoctors

      public void listDoctors()
      Lists all doctors in the system by printing their names to the console. Only displays users who are instances of the Doctor class.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser()
      Deletes a user by prompting for their account number. Displays a success or failure message based on the result.

    • modifyUser

      public void modifyUser()
      Modifies an existing user by prompting for updated information. User must provide the account number, then updates all fields.

    • findDoctorByAccountNumber

      public Doctor findDoctorByAccountNumber(int accountNumber)
      Finds a doctor by their account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number to search for
      Returns:
      the Doctor object if found, null otherwise

    • findPatientByAccountNumber

      public Patient findPatientByAccountNumber(int accountNumber)
      Finds a patient by their account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number to search for
      Returns:
      the Patient object if found, null otherwise

    • createAppointmentMenu

      public void createAppointmentMenu(AppointmentController ac)
      Creates an appointment by prompting for patient and doctor account numbers. Handles the lookup and delegates to the AppointmentController.
      Parameters:
      ac - the AppointmentController to use for creating the appointment

    • listAppointmentsForUser

      public void listAppointmentsForUser(AppointmentController ac)
      Prompts for a user's account number and lists their appointments.
      Parameters:
      ac - the AppointmentController to use for listing appointments
